website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice, but we recommend The Step as it is more user-friendly overall.
pros: It has similar features as The Step, including multiple slip-resistant features
Made by a leading manufacturer in the sports and fitness space
cons: Height adjustment is somewhat tricky until you get familiar with it

customer_reviews.title: Our trainer used this step and we loved it so much that we bought one for ourselves
customer_reviews.text: Our trainer used this step and we loved it so much that we bought one for ourselves. It is very sturdy and extremely easy to change heights with no extra pieces laying around. At the beginning of our weight-loss journey we weighed a total of over 500lbs and both of us did step ups and knee repeaters on this step at the same time with no problem. We use this step for everything from step ups, to low squats, as a bench for chest presses, flys, for tricep dips, and just about anything else you could think of. Love having this piece in my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: arnoldv813

customer_reviews.title: I love this step bench evening more than the original Reebok ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this step bench evening more than the original Reebok Step. I was able to go to Gin Miller's website and purchase the original Step Video and the Power Step video's for under $20.00 each instead of paying an insane $48.00 dollars. Gin Miller is the person who invented the original step and the video. She is awesome. This step works perfect and if you are heavy it will hold your weight without cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: My Review
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I thought it was going to be, it is solid and does not bend at all. I have only had 180lbs on it but it didn't bend. I would recommend this to those that are looking for a step like this. You can also use it as a step stool if doing something else around the house. I like that it can be adjusted to three different heights quickly without using any tools. It is wide enough and long enough to fit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Keithmj

customer_reviews.title: Good bench, see review
customer_reviews.text: I like it except for how you have to level the bench. Those feet can be hard to get off. I like my old reebok step better, you would squeeze the sides and the feet would drop down or up (much easier). It could be a little wider but I do like the fact is doesn't take up as much space as the 'Original Health Club' step, and the feet stay attached to the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: A solid step that allows for easy change of height simply by flipping over the step
customer_reviews.text: A solid step that allows for easy change of height simply by flipping over the step, giving a good yank, and then reversing the process, which can mean placing them under and then stepping on top. The nubs on the top of step help with keeping your foot in place. I haven't sound them to get overly slick; maybe I need to work out harder... Haha
customer_reviews.author: Clint Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well made, great purchase. The only think to know is that there are slight raised bubble like spots on the top that work as slip guards. It is not evenly flat the way most are. So if you do your step exercises barefoot, you will definitely feel the bumps. If you wear exercise shoes, you will not notice the bumps at all and you will not slip at all.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflywadd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy. Best part is that surface is nonskid and safer to use than older version I own. LOVE it! A bit pricey, but much better than others on the market. If you are going to seriously step, this is your best option
customer_reviews.author: Ckcpipe

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever taken a Step class, you KNOW this is the best Step to use. Perfectly sturdy in every level, awesome quality, and a great workout. Completely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth S.

customer_reviews.title: I truly LOVE this step
customer_reviews.text: I truly LOVE this step!! I had gotten other (1 other) exercise step in the past and this Reebok step has reigned supreme. I am about 289lbs and I needed something sturdy that wouldn't move with exercise. I have not been disappointed. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: Adannaya E Nzeogu

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy step. There were no instructions on how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy step. There were no instructions on how to change the height, but the red part unsnaps by pulling it straight out. You can turn it around and snap it back in at the lower height for convenient storage and extra strength. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Carol in AZ

customer_reviews.title: gold standard
customer_reviews.text: Used this step in physical therapy- therapists all praised it Extremely well constructed / recommend
customer_reviews.author: diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Great step!
customer_reviews.text: This step is very good quality & great for step aerobics. It does not bend in the middle like some do, and yet it is soft enough on the top to use when barefoot (not the safest thing to do if you’re jumping on it, though).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this step. Long enough for vsteps and what ever else. height is awesome. Reebok never disappoints
customer_reviews.author: Beth Kastelic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, strong, safe! Excellent product. While being light weight, it still stays in place as we use it as a step to the guest toilet. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stepper
customer_reviews.text: I love this stepper! Perfect size and very sturdy! Really love the design of the risers! It's the perfect width and length!
customer_reviews.author: houstonshopper

customer_reviews.title: I assumed once I got better I could flip the pieces and make it a ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was shorter. I am a beginner so I thought. I assumed once I got better I could flip the pieces and make it a little higher and more challenging. All in all I liked it. I wasn't crazy about the little bubbles on top when it came to be doing exercises that causes me to spin in a circle.
customer_reviews.author: K White

customer_reviews.title: Great Stepper
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister and she is enjoying it. I have an older one and it is still holding up - had it for over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: LindaZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Large and stable. Take a while to figure out how to adjust the height. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best step ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Reebok Step in 1992 and it's still going strong! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Roc

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and my workout is all the better
customer_reviews.text: Waited a long time for this. It's sturdy and my workout is all the better.
customer_reviews.author: Rhax

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. I am happy with my purchase. This is very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Journeyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super solid, well built, high quality, and bigger/wider than the pictures make it look.
customer_reviews.author: Fastpitch Power

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stepper. Still get a good workout when I used it in my 20's.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wings

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this step bench evening more than the original Reebok Step.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: If you're into step aerobics this is a must have! Very sturdy and safe, easy to adjust. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lelegov

customer_reviews.title: Quality step.
customer_reviews.text: The quality you would expect from Reebok. Very wide and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of equipment. The feet adjust easily to change the height of the step. Snaps on and off with little effort. Durable, stable.
customer_reviews.author: anonymously

customer_reviews.title: She loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter who is a trainer and instructor for Orange Theory. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes me back to the 90's! Great product and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Almand

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original!
customer_reviews.text: Almost same design as the original which lasted 25 years for me. Sturdy but top is slightly slippery because nubs create less contact surface with shoe. Still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD D ANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid step that is easily adjustable. It is also very stable for a variety of exercises.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy step
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and safe. Like that you can move it around and it is self contained.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome STEP
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product! Very well made. I use it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: MGNebo

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: This step is high quality and durable. Shipped on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney G

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time came in great condition and looks great in my workout room
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time came in great condition and looks great in my workout room. It so good the dog sleeps on it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zerbest

customer_reviews.title: Great step
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I expected! Love my step! Now I can do my workouts at home!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Above my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Is use this about 5 days a week and it is very stable and allows for a lot of versatility in your movements. This is definitely for all you serious step addicts out there!
customer_reviews.author: momof1

customer_reviews.title: Stable step
customer_reviews.text: Physical therapist recommended this for help getting into a tall vehicle. Works great. Not slim or portable. Beefy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Teri J

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Very sturdy and great looking
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Very sturdy and great looking! Enjoying to do my Reebok Step aerobic workout! Worth every penny! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put it where it's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: No excuse not to move - I have this in my studio in front of my art table. Every time I get up, I can do 10-20 step ups. Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: AZArtist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the step reebok is a great cardio aerobic exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Yeverino

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best cannot imagine a Step made more stable than this.
customer_reviews.text: The best of the best cannot imagine a Step made more stable than this. Works perfect in my studio; my second Reebok. Have seen others nothing is like this.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Exactly what I was looking for ..
customer_reviews.author: Irma Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Good job Reebok!!
customer_reviews.text: New, Nice, and arrived as expected!!! Sturdy stepper! Handles me and my weight!!
customer_reviews.author: Arqutia Hill

customer_reviews.title: Needs instructions for adjusting height
customer_reviews.text: It really should come with instructions of how to adjust the height. I kept thinking I was going to break it, but I didn't. I finally was able adjust it to a higher step even though it took more effort than I would have liked. Other than that, the step is great!
customer_reviews.author: c m.

customer_reviews.title: I liked my other reebok step better.
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece. But I don't like that you have flip it over to change heights. It not as easy as my old reebok step was. That one you just squeezed sides and moved up or down so super easy to do in middle of work out.
customer_reviews.author: Miss54321

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine, but quite heavy. This makes it stable, but it is harder to move about.
customer_reviews.author: Janice F.

customer_reviews.title: Don't alwas expect the items condition to be true.
customer_reviews.text: The item was missing a key connecting piece for one leg to be secured to the platform. The item was used a great deal considering the wear pattern on the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok Professional Aerobic Step
product_meta.description: Introduced to health clubs over 25 years ago, the timeless aerobic Reebok step remains an Integral and immensely popular piece of equipment in the Group fitness exercise arena today. Variety in training is the key to progress and with the Reebok aerobic step you'll find no two workouts are ever the same. This is your platform to perform a large range of basic and more complex exercises from cardiovascular and plyometric training to lower body muscle toning; its versatility is ideal for mixing up any workout PROGRAM. Suitable for all abilities and fitness levels, the Red and Grey Reebok step can be combined with mat work exercises, or used with hand, wrist or ankle weights for an even higher calorie burn. If used in the comfort of your own home, you can choreograph your own routines to your choice of music, but whichever way you decide to use your Reebok step; you'll be a step closer to your fitness goals and improving your overall aerobic health. Sturdy and durable for every lunge and Jump, the Reebok step's non-slip rubber surface means you can focus on your form and positioning, plus it can be height adjusted in three increments (6, 8 or 10-inch) for added Intensity. The workout surface of 39 x 15 inches is large enough for fitness activities, but at the same time the step is compact and easy to store away at home when your workout is complete - convenient and completely hassle free. Fitness trends will change, but the Reebok step is the trusted workout accessory that stands the test of time.
feature_bullets: Versatile piece of equipment is a must have
